languages.text: The Commissar calls for 3 allies within a 20-cell range to come to his side using the shortest possible path. Those allies absorb {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of the Commissar.

traits.locale_text: The Commissar calls for 3 allies within a 20-cell {g|Encyclopedia:Range}range{/g} to come to his side using the shortest possible path. Those allies absorb damage instead of the Commissar.
The Commissar calls for 3 allies within a 20-cell range to come to his side using the shortest possible path. Those allies absorb {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of the Commissar.
The Commissar calls for 3 allies within a 20-cell range to come to his side using the shortest possible path. Those allies absorb {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of the Commissar.

languages.text: Комиссар приказывает 3 союзникам в радиусе 20 клеток приблизиться к нему по кратчайшему пути. Эти союзники принимают на себя {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, направленный в комиссара.
languages.original_text: The Commissar calls for 3 allies within a 20-cell range to come to his side using the shortest possible path. Those allies absorb {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of the Commissar.

traits.locale_text: Комиссар приказывает 3 союзникам в {g|Encyclopedia:Range}радиусе{/g} 20 клеток приблизиться к нему по кратчайшему пути. Эти союзники принимают на себя урон, направленный в комиссара.
Комиссар приказывает 3 союзникам в {g|Encyclopedia:Range}радиусе{/g} 20 клеток приблизиться к нему по кратчайшему пути. Эти союзники принимают на себя урон, направленный в комиссара.

languages.text: 政委命令20格内的3名盟友以最短的路线来到他身边。召唤而来的盟友会代替政委吸收{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: The Commissar calls for 3 allies within a 20-cell range to come to his side using the shortest possible path. Those allies absorb {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of the Commissar.

traits.locale_text: 政委命令20格内的3名盟友以最短的路线来到他身边。{g|Encyclopedia:Range}{/g}召唤而来的盟友会代替政委吸收伤害。
政委命令20格内的3名盟友以最短的路线来到他身边。召唤而来的盟友会代替政委吸收{g|Encyclopedia:Range}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。

languages.text: コミッサーはできるだけ近道で彼のそばへ来るよう、20セル以内の範囲の味方3体を呼ぶ。これらの味方はコミッサーの代わりに{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。
languages.original_text: The Commissar calls for 3 allies within a 20-cell range to come to his side using the shortest possible path. Those allies absorb {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of the Commissar.

traits.locale_text: コミッサーはできるだけ近道で自身のそばへ来るよう、20セル以内の{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}の味方3体を呼ぶ。これらの味方はコミッサーの代わりにダメージを受ける。
コミッサーはできるだけ近道で彼のそばへ来るよう、20セル以内の{g|Encyclopedia:Range}範囲{/g}の味方3体を呼ぶ。これらの味方はコミッサーの代わりに{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受ける。

languages.text: El comisario convoca a 3 aliados en una distancia de 20 casillas para que acudan a su lado por el camino más corto. Dichos aliados absorben el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} en lugar del Comisario.
languages.original_text: The Commissar calls for 3 allies within a 20-cell range to come to his side using the shortest possible path. Those allies absorb {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of the Commissar.

traits.locale_text: El comisario convoca a 3 aliados en una {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distancia{/g} de 20 casillas para que acudan a su lado por el camino más corto. Dichos aliados absorben el daño en lugar del Comisario.

languages.text: Der Kommissar ruft 3 Verbündete im Umkreis von 20 Feldern auf, auf dem kürzesten Weg zu ihm zu kommen. Diese Verbündeten absorbieren {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} anstelle des Kommissars.
languages.original_text: The Commissar calls for 3 allies within a 20-cell range to come to his side using the shortest possible path. Those allies absorb {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of the Commissar.

traits.locale_text: Der Kommissar ruft 3 Verbündete im {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Umkreis{/g} von 20 Feldern dazu auf, auf dem kürzesten Weg zu ihm zu kommen. Diese Verbündeten absorbieren Schaden anstelle des Kommissars.

languages.text: Le commissaire demande à 3 alliés situés dans un rayon de 20 cases de le rejoindre en empruntant le chemin le plus court possible. Ces alliés absorbent les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à sa place.
languages.original_text: The Commissar calls for 3 allies within a 20-cell range to come to his side using the shortest possible path. Those allies absorb {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of the Commissar.

traits.locale_text: Le Commissaire demande à 3 alliés situés dans un {g|Encyclopedia:Range}rayon{/g} de 20 cases de le rejoindre en empruntant le chemin le plus court possible. Ces alliés absorbent les dégâts à sa place.

languages.text: Komiser, kendisine en fazla 20 hücre uzaklıkta bulunan 3 dost birimi mümkün olan en kısa yolu kullanarak yanına çağırır. Bu dost birimler, Komiser yerine {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alırlar.
languages.original_text: The Commissar calls for 3 allies within a 20-cell range to come to his side using the shortest possible path. Those allies absorb {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} instead of the Commissar.
